fulfillment: Drop-ship from Samsung regional warehouse (Memphis, TN)
manufacturer_warranty: Samsung 90-day satisfaction guarantee and 1-year limited warranty. Any unit may be returned to Samsung within 90 days of purchase for a full refund or replacement — no restocking fee, no questions asked. After 90 days and within 1 year, Samsung will repair defective units at no cost. All returns and warranty claims handled through Samsung support at 1-800-SAMSUNG, not through retailer.
notes: Customer A customer reported minor banding on 2024 batch — resolved in current production run

manufacturer_warranty: Dyson 2-year parts and labor warranty. Covers defects and battery. Dyson offers free repair or replacement through Dyson support. Warranty claims must go through Dyson directly at dyson.com/support — retailer is not authorized to process warranty claims or replacements.

Shun limited lifetime warranty against defects in materials and workmanship. Free sharpening for life of the knife — send to KAI sharpening center in Tualatin, OR. Chips and damage from misuse (bone cutting, frozen food, dishwasher) not covered. Warranty handled by KAI USA, not retailer.
